pages.title: Certus Quartz Ore
pages.text: A commonly found ore which, when mined, drops $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#crystal)Certus Quartz Crystal$(/l). Another varient, $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#charged_ore)Charged Certus Quartz Ore$(/l), also spawns in the Overworld more rarely.

pages.title: Certus Quartz Crystal
pages.text: A commonly found resource in the Overworld. When charged in the $(l:appliedenergistics2:me_network/powered_machines/charger)Charger$(/l) it will convert into $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#charged_crystal)Charged Certus Quartz Crystal$(/l).$(br)Crystal yield can be improved by using $(l:appliedenergistics2:misc/purification)purification$(/l) by growing the raw crystals into $(item)Pure Certus Quartz Crystal$().$(br)Can be ground up in the $(l:appliedenergistics2:simple_tools/grindstone)Quartz Grindstone$(/l) to produce $(item)Certus Quartz Dust$().

pages.title: Charged C. Q. Ore
pages.text: Spawns semi commonly in the overworld, but unlike $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore)Certus Quartz Ore$(/l) it drops $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#charged_crystal)Charged Certus Quartz Crystal.$(/l)

pages.title: Charged C. Q. Crystal
pages.text: Dropped from $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#charged_ore)Charged Certus Quartz Ore$(/l), or can be manufactured from $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#crystal)Certus Quartz Crystal$(/l) using the $(l:appliedenergistics2:me_network/powered_machines/charger)Charger$(/l).$(br2)$(item)Charged Certus Quartz Crystal$() is used to make $(item)Fluix Crystal$() by placing it in water near $(item)Redstone$() and $(item)Nether Quartz$().
